passages.text:
You got a call of a robbery at a convinent store. You make it there as soon as the robber is leaving and start chasing him. You dont chase him long before he stops at an abandoned building and runs inside. You follow behind quickly and enter the front door. Inside you see three doors. One striaght ahead, left, and right. You know have to find the robber.
[[Enter Straight Door->Living Room]]
[[Enter Right Door->Bathroom]]
[[Enter Left Door->Bedroom]]
[[Call Out->Entrance Yell]]
passages.name: Entering Building

passages.text:
Inside the door it looks like an old kitchen. It is completly empty besides some old cabinets and a place where a stove and dishwasher used to be. You do not see the robber. There are no other doors in kitchen besides the one you came in.
[[Check Cabinets->Cabinets]]
[[Leave Room->Kitchen to Living Room]]
passages.name: Kitchen

passages.text:
Inside the door you see a bathroom. There is a shower with a curtain which is blocking what is inside, a sink, and a toilet with a broken lid. At the moment you do not see the robber. There is only a door back to where you were.
[[Open Curtains->Open Curtains]]
[[Leave Room->Bathroom to Entrance Hall]]
passages.name: Bathroom

passages.text:
Inside the door you find what must be the bedroom. It is empty besides some old clothes and trash on the floor. There is a closet door which is open on the left wall. You can see some old hangers lying on the ground but no robber. On the right wall is a closed door.
[[Enter Right Door->Laundry Room]]
[[Enter Room You Left->Bedroom to Entrance Hall]]
passages.name: Bedroom

passages.text:
Inside there is a large room which must be the living room. There does not seem to be any sign of the robber in this room. You have a door to your left and a door to your right.
[[Enter Left Door->Laundry Room]]
[[Enter Right Door->Kitchen]]
[[Enter Room You Left->Living room to Entrance Hall]]
passages.name: Living Room

passages.text:
You yell to get the robbers attention but only get silence in return. Even though it did not come up with any results you knew you had to try. You still have the three doors in front of you.
[[Enter Left Door->Bathroom]]
[[Enter Right Door->Bedroom]]
[[Enter Straight Door->Living Room]]
passages.name: Entrance Yell

passages.text:
You are slow to the curtains but open them quick. There are a couple cobwebs in the shower but no robber. Frustrated you close the curtains and turn around still inside the bathroom.
[[Open Curtains->Open Curtains]]
[[Leave Room->Bathroom to Entrance Hall]]
passages.name: Open Curtains

passages.text:
You open the door to hear the robber yell at you to stop. That he is willing to fight you and that you should go away. You open the door anyway and see him. He has a mask on his face and a bag full of what must be the money he robbed.
[[Fire Taser->Tassed Robber]]
[[Tackle Robber->Caught Robber]]
passages.name: Laundry Room

passages.text:
You never know what to expect so you decide to check the cabinets for the robber. You open every one but do not see the robber. You turn around and face the door which you came in here from.
[[Check Cabinets->Cabinets]]
[[Leave Room->Living Room]]
passages.name: Cabinets

passages.text: You run as fast as you can at the robber. Get him to the ground and apply the handcuffs. He puts up a bit of a fight but gives up pretty quickly because he knows he has lost. You take the robber and the money outside of the house and to your police cruiser. You put the robber in the back seat and put the money in the trunk. You caught the robber and did not even need the back up that you knew would be on the way.
passages.name: Caught Robber

passages.text: You tase the robber and get him to the ground to apply the handcuffs. He puts up a bit of a fight but gives up pretty quickly because he knows he has lost. You take the robber and the money outside of the house and to your police cruiser. You put the robber in the back seat and put the money in the trunk. You caught the robber and did not even need the back up that you knew would be on the way.
passages.name: Tassed Robber

passages.text:
You are back in entrance hall. You have not seen any trace of the robber. You could enter back through the door you just came, a door to your right and door straight ahead.
[[Enter Straight Door->Bedroom]]
[[Enter Right Door->Living Room]]
[[Enter Room You Left->Bathroom]]
passages.name: Bathroom to Entrance Hall

passages.text:
You are back in entrance hall. You have not seen any trace of the robber. You could enter back through the door you just came, a door to your left and door straight ahead.
[[Enter Straight Door->Bathroom]]
[[Enter Left Door->Living Room]]
[[Enter Room You Left->Bedroom]]
passages.name: Bedroom to Entrance Hall

passages.text:
You are back in entrance hall. You have not seen any trace of the robber. You could enter back through the door you just came, a door to your right and door straight ahead.
[[Enter Straight Door->Bathroom]]
[[Enter Right Door->Bedroom]]
[[Enter Room You Left->Living Room]]
passages.name: Living room to Entrance Hall

passages.text:
You are back in living room. You have not seen any trace of the robber. You could enter back through the door you just came, a door to your left and door straight ahead.
[[Enter Straight Door->Laundry Room]]
[[Enter Right Door->Living room to Entrance Hall]]
[[Enter Room You Left->Kitchen]]
passages.name: Kitchen to Living Room
